devdoc.author: Legion
devdoc.details: Inherits from LegionAbstractSale and implements ILegionSealedBidAuctionSale with ECIES encryption features for bid privacy.

BalanceQueryForZeroAddress().details: Cannot query the balance for the zero address.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

ERC5192__LockedToken(uint256).details: Thrown when attempting to transfer a locked token.

params.tokenId: The identifier for the token that cannot be transferred.

ERC5192__TransferToSelf(uint256).details: Thrown when attempting to transfer a token to itself.

params.tokenId: The identifier for the token that cannot be transferred to itself.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

params.investor: The address of the investor attempting to claim excess.
The address of the investor attempting to settle.

LegionSale__CancelLocked().details: Indicates cancellation is prevented, typically during result publication.

LegionSale__CancelNotLocked().details: Indicates cancellation lock is required but not set.

params.amount: The amount of excess capital the investor is trying to withdraw.
params.investor: The address of the investor attempting to withdraw.

LegionSale__CapitalNotRaised().details: Indicates no capital is available for withdrawal.

LegionSale__InvalidBidPrivateKey().details: Indicates the private key does not correspond to the public key.

LegionSale__InvalidBidPublicKey().details: Indicates the public key is not valid or does not match the auction key.

LegionSale__InvalidPeriodConfig().details: Indicates periods (e.g., sale, refund) are outside allowed ranges.

params.signature: The signature provided by the investor.

params.expectedAmount: The expected token amount to be supplied.

params.amount: The amount of tokens requested for withdrawal.

params.investor: The address of the investor who claimed excess.
The address of the refunded investor.
The address of the non-whitelisted investor.

params.currentTimestamp: The current timestamp when the action is attempted.
params.refundEndTimestamp: The timestamp when the refund period ends.

params.currentTimestamp: The current timestamp when the action is attempted.
params.refundEndTimestamp: The timestamp when the refund period ends.

params.timestamp: The current timestamp when the action is attempted.

params.positionId: The ID of the position that cannot be merged.
The ID of the position that cannot be transferred.

params.epochDurationSeconds: The duration of each epoch in seconds.
params.numberOfEpochs: The total number of epochs in the vesting schedule.
params.tokenAllocationOnTGERate: The token allocation released at TGE (18 decimal precision).
params.vestingCliffDurationSeconds: The duration of the cliff period in seconds.
params.vestingDurationSeconds: The duration of the vesting schedule in seconds.
params.vestingStartTimestamp: The Unix timestamp when vesting starts.
params.vestingType: The type of vesting schedule (linear or epoch-based).

NotOwnerNorApproved().details: Only the token owner or an approved account can manage the token.

TransferFromIncorrectOwner().details: The token must be owned by `from`.

TransferToNonERC721ReceiverImplementer().details: Cannot safely transfer to a contract that does not implement the ERC721Receiver interface.

TransferToZeroAddress().details: Cannot mint or transfer to the zero address.

params.merkleRoot: The Merkle root for accepted capital verification.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `account` to manage the `id` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables `operator` to manage all of their tokens.

params.amount: The amount of capital invested (in bid tokens).
params.encryptedAmountOut: The encrypted bid amount of tokens from the investor.
params.positionId: The unique identifier for the investment position.

params.investor: The address of the investor receiving refund.
params.positionId: The ID of the investor's position.

params.investor: The address of the investor receiving refund.

params.token: The address of the token withdrawn.

params.amount: The amount of excess capital withdrawn.
params.investor: The address of the investor claiming excess.
params.positionId: The ID of the investor's position.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized.

params.legionFeeReceiver: The updated Legion fee receiver address.

Locked(uint256).details: If a token is minted and the status is locked, this event should be emitted.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

params.acceptedMerkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying accepted capital.
params.capitalRaised: The total capital raised from the auction.
params.claimMerkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying token claims.
params.fixedSalt: The fixed salt used for sealing bids.
params.sealedBidPrivateKey: The private key used to decrypt sealed bids.
params.tokensAllocated: The total tokens allocated from the sale.

params.amountOnClaim: The amount of tokens distributed immediately.
params.amountToBeVested: The amount of tokens sent to vesting contract.
params.investor: The address of the claiming investor.
params.positionId: The ID of the investor's position.

params.legionFee: The fee amount collected by Legion.
params.referrerFee: The fee amount collected by referrer.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when token `id` is transferred from `from` to `to`.

Unlocked(uint256).details: If a token is minted and the status is unlocked, this event should be emitted.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets `account` as the approved account to manage token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - The caller must be the owner of the token,   or an approved operator for the token owner. Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens owned by `owner`. Requirements: - `owner` must not be the zero address.

cancel().details: Allows cancellation before results are published; only callable by the project admin.

params.amount: The total amount of tokens to claim.
params.investorVestingConfig: The vesting configuration for the investor.
params.proof: The Merkle proof for claim verification.

params.encryptedAmountOut: The encrypted bid amount from the investor.
params.investor: The address of the investor who made the bid.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.token: The address of the token to withdraw.

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved to manage token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist.

params.amount: The amount of capital to invest.
params.sealedBid: The encoded sealed bid data (encrypted amount out, salt, public key).
params.signature: The Legion signature for investor verification.

returns.vestingStatus: The complete vesting status including timestamps, amounts, and release information.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns whether `operator` is approved to manage the tokens of `owner`.

locked(uint256).details: SBTs assigned to the zero address are considered invalid, and queries about them will revert.

returns._0: True if the token is locked, false otherwise.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.acceptedMerkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying accepted capital.
params.capitalRaised: The total capital raised from the auction.
params.claimMerkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying token claims.
params.fixedSalt: The fixed salt used for sealing bids.
params.sealedBidPrivateKey: The private key to decrypt sealed bids.
params.tokensAllocated: The total tokens allocated for investors.

releaseVestedTokens().details: Interacts with the investor's vesting contract to release available tokens.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Transfers token `id` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - `from` must be the owner of the token. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - The caller must be the owner of the token, or be approved to manage the token. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement   {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

sealedBidAuctionSaleConfiguration().details: Provides read-only access to the auction configuration.

returns._0: The complete sealed bid auction sale configuration struct.

params.merkleRoot: The Merkle root for accepted capital verification.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Sets whether `operator` is approved to manage the tokens of the caller. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to supply.
params.referrerFee: The fee amount for the referrer.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165 This function call must use less than 30000 gas.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for token `id`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers token `id` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - `from` must be the owner of the token. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - The caller must be the owner of the token, or be approved to manage the token. Emits a {Transfer} event.

params.from: The address of the current owner.
params.positionId: The ID of the position to transfer.
params.to: The address of the new owner.

params.from: The address of the current owner.
params.positionId: The ID of the position to transfer.
params.signature: The cryptographic signature authorizing the transfer.
params.to: The address of the new owner.

params.amount: The amount of excess capital to withdraw.
params.proof: The Merkle proof for excess capital verification.

s_sealedBidAuctionSaleConfig.details: Struct containing the sealed bid auction sale configuration

devdoc.title: Legion Sealed Bid Auction

LegionSale__AlreadyClaimedExcess(address.notice: Thrown when an investor attempts to claim excess capital that was already claimed.

LegionSale__AlreadySettled(address).notice: Thrown when an investor attempts to settle tokens that are already settled.

LegionSale__CancelLocked().notice: Thrown when sale cancellation is locked.

LegionSale__CancelNotLocked().notice: Thrown when sale cancellation is not locked but should be.

LegionSale__CannotWithdrawExcessInvested.notice: Thrown when an investor is not eligible to withdraw excess invested capital.

LegionSale__CapitalAlreadyWithdrawn().notice: Thrown when capital has already been withdrawn by the project.

LegionSale__CapitalNotRaised().notice: Thrown when no capital has been raised.

LegionSale__InvalidBidPrivateKey().notice: Thrown when an invalid private key is provided for bid decryption.

LegionSale__InvalidBidPublicKey().notice: Thrown when an invalid public key is used for bid encryption.

LegionSale__InvalidFeeAmount(uint256,uin.notice: Thrown when an invalid fee amount is provided.

LegionSale__InvalidInvestAmount(uint256).notice: Thrown when an invalid investment amount is provided.

LegionSale__InvalidPeriodConfig().notice: Thrown when an invalid time period configuration is provided.

LegionSale__InvalidSignature(bytes).notice: Thrown when an invalid signature is provided for investment.

LegionSale__InvalidTokenAmountSupplied(u.notice: Thrown when an invalid amount of tokens is supplied by the project.

LegionSale__InvalidWithdrawAmount(uint25.notice: Thrown when an invalid withdrawal amount is requested.

LegionSale__InvestorHasClaimedExcess(add.notice: Thrown when an investor who has already claimed excess capital attempts another action.

LegionSale__InvestorHasRefunded(address).notice: Thrown when an investor who has already refunded attempts another action.

LegionSale__InvestorPositionDoesNotExist.notice: Thrown when attempting to access a non-existent investor position.

LegionSale__NotCalledByLegion().notice: Thrown when a function is not called by the Legion address.

LegionSale__NotCalledByProject().notice: Thrown when a function is not called by the project admin.

LegionSale__NotInClaimWhitelist(address).notice: Thrown when an investor is not in the token claim whitelist.

LegionSale__PrivateKeyAlreadyPublished().notice: Thrown when the private key has already been published.

LegionSale__PrivateKeyNotPublished().notice: Thrown when attempting decryption before the private key is published.

LegionSale__RefundPeriodIsNotOver(uint25.notice: Thrown when an action is attempted before the refund period ends.

LegionSale__RefundPeriodIsOver(uint256,u.notice: Thrown when a refund is attempted after the refund period ends.

LegionSale__SaleHasEnded(uint256).notice: Thrown when an action is attempted after the sale has ended.

LegionSale__SaleIsCanceled().notice: Thrown when an action is attempted on a canceled sale.

LegionSale__SaleIsNotCanceled().notice: Thrown when an action requires the sale to be canceled first.

LegionSale__SaleResultsAlreadyPublished(.notice: Thrown when attempting to republish sale results.

LegionSale__SaleResultsNotPublished().notice: Thrown when an action requires published sale results.

LegionSale__TokensAlreadyAllocated().notice: Thrown when attempting to reallocate tokens.

LegionSale__TokensAlreadySupplied().notice: Thrown when attempting to resupply tokens.

LegionSale__TokensNotAllocated().notice: Thrown when an action requires token allocation first.

LegionSale__TokensNotSupplied().notice: Thrown when an action requires supplied tokens first.

LegionSale__UnableToMergeInvestorPositio.notice: Thrown when attempting to merge an investor position that has been refunded or settled.

LegionSale__UnableToTransferInvestorPosi.notice: Thrown when attempting to transfer a position that has been refunded or settled.

LegionSale__ZeroAddressProvided().notice: Thrown when a zero address is provided as a parameter.

LegionSale__ZeroValueProvided().notice: Thrown when a zero value is provided as a parameter.

LegionVesting__InvalidVestingConfig(uint.notice: Thrown when the vesting configuration parameters are invalid.

AcceptedCapitalSet(bytes32).notice: Emitted when accepted capital Merkle root is published by Legion.

CapitalInvested(uint256,uint256,address,.notice: Emitted when capital is successfully invested in the sealed bid auction.

CapitalRefunded(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when capital is refunded to an investor.

CapitalRefundedAfterCancel(uint256,addre.notice: Emitted when capital is refunded after sale cancellation.

CapitalWithdrawn(uint256).notice: Emitted when capital is withdrawn by the project owner.

EmergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted during an emergency withdrawal by Legion.

ExcessCapitalWithdrawn(uint256,address,u.notice: Emitted when excess capital is claimed by an investor after sale completion.

LegionAddressesSynced(address,address,ad.notice: Emitted when Legion addresses are synced from the registry.

Locked(uint256).notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to locked.

PublishSaleResultsInitialized().notice: Emitted when the process of publishing sale results is initialized.

SaleCanceled().notice: Emitted when a sale is canceled.

SaleResultsPublished(bytes32,bytes32,uin.notice: Emitted when sale results are published by the Legion admin.

TokenAllocationClaimed(uint256,uint256,a.notice: Emitted when an investor successfully claims their token allocation.

TokensSuppliedForDistribution(uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when tokens are supplied for distribution by the project.

Unlocked(uint256).notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to unlocked.

claimTokenAllocation(uint256,(uint64,uin.notice: Claims token allocation for an investor.

decryptSealedBid(uint256,address).notice: Decrypts a sealed bid using the published private key.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Performs an emergency withdrawal of tokens.

initialize((uint64,uint64,uint16,uint16,.notice: Initializes the sealed bid auction sale contract with parameters.

initializePublishSaleResults().notice: Locks sale cancellation to initialize publishing of results.

invest(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: Allows an investor to invest in the sealed bid auction.

locked(uint256).notice: Returns the locking status of a Soulbound Token.

publishSaleResults(bytes32,bytes32,uint2.notice: Publishes auction results including token allocation and capital raised.

refund().notice: Requests a refund from the sale during the refund window.

releaseVestedTokens().notice: Releases vested tokens to the investor.

sealedBidAuctionSaleConfiguration().notice: Returns the current sealed bid auction sale configuration.

setAcceptedCapital(bytes32).notice: Sets the Merkle root for accepted capital verification.

supplyTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Supplies tokens for distribution after the sale.

syncLegionAddresses().notice: Synchronizes Legion addresses from the address registry.

transferInvestorPosition(address,address.notice: Transfers an investor position from one address to another.

transferInvestorPositionWithAuthorizatio.notice: Transfers an investor position with cryptographic authorization.

withdrawExcessInvestedCapital(uint256,by.notice: Withdraws excess invested capital back to the investor.

withdrawInvestedCapitalIfCanceled().notice: Withdraws invested capital if the sale is canceled.

withdrawRaisedCapital().notice: Withdraws raised capital to the project admin.

userdoc.notice: Executes sealed bid auctions of ERC20 tokens after Token Generation Event (TGE).
